item.title: 以色列将延长利率暂停期，因对战争不确定性持谨慎态度
item.description: 以色列央行将在连续第 14 次会议上维持利率不变，对加沙持续战争影响的担忧超过了积极的经济数据。【原文：Israel’s central bank is set to hold interest rates for a 14th consecutive meeting, with concerns over the impact of the ongoing war in Gaza outweighing positive economic data.】

item.title: 中国通过发放电动汽车通行证打击廉价出口的声誉
item.description: 据分析人士称，中国要求汽车制造商获得出口电动汽车的许可，这加强了对这一庞大产业的控制，有助于中国抵御廉价汽车充斥全球市场的指责。【原文：China’s requirement that automakers get permits to export electric vehicles ramps up a push to tighten control of the sprawling industry and help the country fend off accusations that it’s flooding the global market with cheap cars, according to analysts.】

item.title: 英伟达在中国市场举棋不定，华为将把顶级人工智能芯片产量增加一倍
item.description: 华为技术有限公司正准备在明年大幅提高其最先进人工智能芯片的产量，目的是在全球最大的半导体市场赢得客户，与此同时，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. is preparing to sharply ramp up production of its most advanced artificial intelligence chips over the next year, aiming to win customers in the world’s biggest semiconductor market while Nvidia Corp. struggles with geopolitical headwinds.】

item.title: Vitol 投资的 VPI 将斥资 6 亿欧元在德国生产电池
item.description: 由贸易巨头维多集团（Vitol Group）支持的电力公司 VPI 首席执行官豪尔赫-皮库尼奇（Jorge Pikunic）在接受彭博新闻社采访时表示，该公司可能投资 6 亿多欧元（7 亿美元）在德国开发千兆瓦级的电池储能场组合。【原文：VPI, the power company backed by trading giant Vitol Group, could invest more than €600 million ($700 million) to develop a gigawatt-scale portfolio of battery storage sites in Germany, Chief Executive Office Jorge Pikunic told Bloomberg News in an interview.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席誓言快速处理终止季度报告的提案
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构承诺将快速落实唐纳德-特朗普提出的终止大多数公司季度报告制度的建议，这是美国总统对美国资本主义透明度长期争论的最新尝试。【原文：Wall Street’s top regulator pledged to fast-track Donald Trump’s proposal to end quarterly reporting for most companies, the US president’s latest foray into a long-running debate over transparency in American capitalism.】

item.title: 特朗普公司在沙特阿拉伯投资 10 亿美元开发新项目
item.description: 特朗普组织已签署协议，将在沙特阿拉伯第二大城市新建一个价值超过 10 亿美元的商业和住宅开发项目，这是美国总统的家族企业在沙特阿拉伯王国的又一个项目。【原文：The Trump Organization has inked a deal to build a new commercial and housing development valued at over $1 billion in Saudi Arabia’s second largest city, another project for the US president’s family firm in the kingdom.】

item.title: 华尔街适应股票估值高企的新常态
item.description: 最近，股票估值飙升到了平流层，引起了市场怀疑论者的愤怒，他们警告说现在不是买入的时候。【原文：Equity valuations have soared into the stratosphere of late, drawing the ire of market skeptics who warn that now’s not the time to buy.】

item.title: 衰退风险低迷，高盛策略师转而看好股市
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Global equities are likely to extend a rally into the year end given a resilient US economy, supportive valuations and a dovish pivot from the Federal Reserve, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 竞争对手月亮湖公司的试验数据公布后，UCB 股价再创新高
item.description: 在分析师称竞争对手 MoonLake Immunotherapeutics 的后期临床试验数据显示 UCB 的皮肤病药物更胜一筹后，UCB SA 的股价飙升至历史新高。MoonLake 在盘前交易中损失了大部分价值。【原文：UCB SA shares surged to a record high after analysts said late-stage clinical trial data from rival MoonLake Immunotherapeutics showed UCB’s skin disorder medicine is superior. MoonLake lost most of its value in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克仍担心美国通胀前景
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，通胀率可能在 2028 年之前一直高于目标值，这是她反对降息的一个顾虑。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said inflation that could stay above target until 2028 is a concern for her as she argues against interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 意大利撤销对第一大股东中化集团影响的调查
item.description: 意大利已经结束了对倍耐力（Pirelli & C SpA）最大股东中化控股有限公司（Sinochem Holdings Corp.【原文：Italy has closed a probe into whether Pirelli & C SpA’s largest shareholder, Sinochem Holdings Corp., violated restrictions on its role at the tiremaker aimed at limiting Chinese influence over strategic assets.】

item.title: 印度任命 Shirish Murmu 为中央银行副行长
item.description: 印度任命职业央行行长 Shirish Chandra Murmu 为副行长之一，任期三年，从 10 月 9 日开始。【原文：India has appointed Shirish Chandra Murmu, a career central banker, as one of its deputy governors for a three-year term starting Oct. 9.】

item.title: 商务部长称台湾必须帮助美国生产一半芯片
item.description: 华盛顿要求台湾将投资和芯片生产转移到美国，这样美国需求的一半就可以在当地生产，这勾勒出全球半导体产业的彻底转变。【原文：Washington is demanding Taiwan move investment and chip production to the US so half of American demand is manufactured locally, outlining a radical shift for the global semiconductor industry.】

item.title: 科威特选择高盛等银行发行 2017 年以来首支欧洲债券
item.description: 在挑选银行安排出售美元债务之后，科威特八年来首次重返国际债券市场。【原文：Kuwait is set to return to the international bond market for the first time in eight years, after picking banks to arrange a sale of dollar debt.】

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚法院撤销针对力拓的潘古纳矿集体诉讼
item.description: 巴布亚新几内亚国家法院驳回了一起针对力拓集团和一个前单位的数十亿美元的集体诉讼，该诉讼据称是由该国布干维尔地区历史悠久的潘古纳铜矿造成的损害引起的。【原文：Papua New Guinea’s National Court dismissed a multi-billion-dollar class-action lawsuit against Rio Tinto Group and a former unit over damage allegedly caused by the historic Panguna copper mine in the country’s Bougainville region.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车供应商推动欧盟内容规则以保护工作岗位
item.description: 欧洲的汽车供应商正在呼吁制定新的规则，以确保该地区生产的汽车大量使用本地制造的零部件，从而保护面临越来越大压力的汽车行业。【原文：Europe’s auto suppliers are calling for new rules to ensure cars built in the region use a significant share of locally made components, a bid to protect an industry under mounting pressure.】

item.description: 随着日本富裕阶层将更多储蓄用于投资，瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. is seeking to strengthen its wealth management business and take on industry leader Nomura Holdings Inc. as well-to-do Japanese invest more of their savings.】

item.title: 土耳其在欺诈案调查中控制朴控股集团
item.description: 土耳其一家法院将 Ciner 集团的 Park Holding 公司及其子公司置于一家国营基金的控制之下，同时检察官对欺诈指控展开调查。【原文：A Turkish court placed Ciner Group’s Park Holding and its subsidiaries under the control of a state-run fund while prosecutors pursue an investigation into allegations of fraud.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德支持的 GEMS 是沙特学校运营商的竞标者之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）支持的迪拜学校运营商 GEMS Education 是为沙特阿拉伯 Ajialuna Educational Co.【原文：GEMS Education, the Dubai school operator backed by Brookfield Asset Management, is among parties that have submitted initial bids for Saudi Arabia’s Ajialuna Educational Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦下令压缩开支以控制预算
item.description: 津巴布韦命令政府部门停止未编入预算的开支，将资金仅用于支持南部非洲国家经济增长的项目。【原文：Zimbabwe ordered government departments to halt unbudgeted spending and focus funds only on projects that will support economic growth in the southern African nation.】

item.title: 中国重要油港将出台措施遏制影子船队
item.description: 中国青岛港的原油吞吐量约占全国总吞吐量的六分之一，该港的一些码头运营商将对老旧油轮实施新的限制措施；此举被普遍认为是针对运载来自伊朗和其他敏感供应商的受制裁石油的船只。【原文：Some terminal operators at China’s Qingdao Port, which handles around one-sixth of the country’s crude intake, will impose new restrictions on old tankers — a move widely seen as targeting vessels that carry sanctioned oil from Iran and other sensitive suppliers.】

item.title: Swift 将为金融公司建立基于区块链的账本
item.description: 斯威夫特公司（Swift）是全球金融机构每天用于发送数千万笔交易指令的信息传输系统的运行实体，该公司将在其基础设施中增加一个基于区块链的分类账。【原文：Swift, the entity that runs the messaging system used by financial institutions globally to send instructions on tens of millions of transactions a day, will add a blockchain-based ledger to its infrastructure.】

item.title: Makhlouf 称欧洲央行已接近降息周期的 "底部
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）表示，降息周期已接近尾声。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said the cycle of interest-rate reductions is near its end.】

item.title: 西班牙通胀率创 15 个月新高，支持欧洲央行维持利率不变
item.description: 西班牙通胀率达到一年多来的最高水平，为欧洲中央银行下月维持利率不变提供了支持。【原文：Spanish inflation hit the highest level in more than a year, backing the case for the European Central Bank to leave interest rates unchanged next month.】

item.title: 日本央行鸽派委员认为加息必要性上升，同时注意到风险
item.description: 日本央行的一位鸽派董事指出，加息的必要性正在上升，这表明对加息行动的支持正在扩大，但他也强调了来自国外的持续风险，从而缓和了他的讲话。【原文：A dovish Bank of Japan board member pointed to the rising need for an interest rate hike, signaling broadening support for action, although he also tempered his message by highlighting continued risks from abroad.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席财务官下台，高层进一步调整
item.description: Stellantis NV 首席财务官道格-奥斯特曼（Doug Ostermann）即将卸任，这是这家试图东山再起的汽车制造商高层的又一次变动。【原文：Stellantis NV Chief Financial Officer Doug Ostermann is stepping down, another change at the top of the automaker that’s trying to make a comeback.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司同意出售北美太阳能资产股份
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）同意出售北美地区 50%的太阳能资产股份，该交易的企业价值为 12.5 亿美元。【原文：TotalEnergies SE agreed to sell a 50% stake in solar assets in North America in a deal valuing the portfolio at an enterprise value of $1.25 billion.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克首席执行官沃姆斯利将由商务总监接任
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司首席执行官艾玛-沃姆斯利（Emma Walmsley）在任职近九年后即将卸任，英国制药商首席商务官卢克-米尔斯（Luke Miels）将接替她的职位。【原文：GSK Plc Chief Executive Officer Emma Walmsley is stepping down after almost nine years and will be succeeded by the British drugmaker’s chief commercial officer, Luke Miels.】
